snippet: The male stereotype wrought by the Broadway musical “The Book of Mormon” may change rapidly, now that the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints has lowered the age for missionary service for women to 19.
abstract: Change in Mormon church policy lowering age requirement for missionary service is prompting thousands of young Mormon women to sign up to serve as missionaries.
lead_paragraph: The male stereotype wrought by the Broadway musical “The Book of Mormon” may change rapidly, now that the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints has lowered the age for missionary service for women to 19.

headline.seo: Young Mormon Women Jump at the Chance to Become Missionaries at 19
headline.main: More Mormon Women Enroll as Missionaries
headline.print_headline: More Mormon Women Enroll as Missionaries

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject
